title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.12 - Charges for use of terminal to be paid in cash; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.12 - Charges for use of terminal to be paid in cash; exceptions

State Regulations

All charges due to the Port Authority for the use of
air terminals shall be payable in cash unless credit arrangements satisfactory
to the Port Authority have been made in advance or permission has been secured
for payment by check. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
